passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > main:nth-child(49) > div:nth-child(1) > section > header:nth-child(1) > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(49) > div:nth-child(1) > section > header:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(3)
html > body > main:nth-child(49) > div:nth-child(1) > section > header:nth-child(1) > h4:nth-child(6)
html > body > div:nth-child(50) > footer:nth-child(2) > section > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(50) > footer:nth-child(2) > section > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(98) > div:nth-child(2) > header:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
